originalText.text: Nicole from Magma Global planned the most amazing trip to Switzerland for my two friends and I. She knew all the best places to go and was accessible throughout the entirety of our trip for any questions. Everything was made extremely easy for us. I cannot recommend this agency enough, thank you Nicole and Magma Global!!!

originalText.text: Nicole from Magma Global recently planned our trip to London & Paris and it was INCREDIBLE! She listened to our interests and must-sees, and booked us the most perfect vacation. She was a pleasure to work with, and we're already looking forward to our next trip planned by Magma Global! Thank you Nicole!!!

She was a pleasure to work with, and we're already looking forward to our next trip planned by Magma Global! Thank you Nicole!!!

originalText.text: Sunny planned our most fabulous trip to Greece. Every hotel and excursion was really top notch. And then, in a horrible, emergency situation Sunny and Magma went above and beyond to help with every detail. I will be forever grateful. My sincerest thanks and appreciation.

text.text: Sunny planned our most fabulous trip to Greece. Every hotel and excursion was really top notch. And then, in a horrible, emergency situation Sunny and Magma went above and beyond to help with every detail. I will be forever grateful. My sincerest thanks and appreciation.

originalText.text: We worked with Nicole to plan our honeymoon and she was extremely attentive and patient. She listened to what we were looking for and the honeymoon and entire process exceeded our expectations. We didn't have to worry about one thing throughout the planning process as well as our actual trip. Would highly, highly recommend.

text.text: We worked with Nicole to plan our honeymoon and she was extremely attentive and patient. She listened to what we were looking for and the honeymoon and entire process exceeded our expectations. We didn't have to worry about one thing throughout the planning process as well as our actual trip. Would highly, highly recommend.

originalText.text: I cannot recommend Magma Global enough! This was my first time using a travel agent and I am certain I will use this company again! I recently worked with Sophie Greenburg who helped me plan a honeymoon trip to Thailand. I reached out to Sophie very last minute in hopes that she could assist us in planning our trip — and she went above and beyond for us. She was always responsive, provided us with amazing and personalized recommendations, and booked things for us promptly (she even provided us with loads of options). We had a trip of a lifetime and we owe so much of that to Magma Global. Thank you for offering 5-star service (that is also affordable). I look forward to working with this team again in the future!

text.text: I cannot recommend Magma Global enough! This was my first time using a travel agent and I am certain I will use this company again!
